purpose: To describe the Smart multiple® analysis tool and its applications.
title: Tool profile: Smart multiple® analysis

bullets.text: SmartMultiple is BCG’s proprietary approach to pinpointing the drivers of valuation multiples
Based on a set of peer companies
Based on over 200 different financial (and non-financial) KPIs as potential drivers
SmartMultiple analysis is an important input for:
Portfolio and business plan reviews based on (i)TSR contributions
Understanding drivers of multiples is key to:
Make the right strategic decisions (e.g., M&A)
Emphasize the right things in investor relations

reasoning_strategy: Explains the methodology and applications of the tool.
layout: Three vertically aligned sections with descriptions

text_rules.emphasis_rule: Use of bold for key terms
